Author: Lunar_Heart
Text: I really see my own current plight in this. I've been missing that feeling of dissociation. It's so similar to being high but I've never found the right substance to substitute (and I'm trying not to pick up any new bad habits so that search has been suspended). I wish I had something more productive to offer than my sympathy and commiseration, but that's all I've got. I hope the road smooths out for both of us soon. Hang tough. I believe in you.
